snippet: Edward O. Wilson thinks we should set aside half the planet as wilderness, and he believes we can do it. In a new book, he tells the story of a nature preserve in Mozambique to make his case.
abstract: Jonathan Weiner reviews book A Window on Eternity: A Biologist's Walk Through Gorongosa National Park by Edward O Wilson.
lead_paragraph: Edward O. Wilson thinks we should set aside half the planet as wilderness, and he believes we can do it. In a new book, he tells the story of a nature preserve in Mozambique to make his case.

headline.print_headline: Transported to Paradise, but Needing More
headline.seo: In ‘A Window on Eternity,’ Edward. O. Wilson Finds a Paradise, but Says More Are Needed
headline.main: Transported to Paradise, but Needing More
